extendedInfo.description: Bott Radio Network offers America's finest Bible Teaching, Christian News and Information heard 24/7 across the nation and around the world. Our goal is to help people grow in the Lord and apply their faith in their daily lives.Bott Radio Network broadcasts on 88 terrestrial radio stations, reaching into 15 states with a combined coverage of 40 million people. BRN is also heard nationwide on SkyAngel Channel 202, worldwide online at BottRadioNetwork.com, and right here on your phone. You can also find us on Facebook and follow us on Twitter.Since 1962, BRN has been a pioneer and a leader in Christian teaching and talk radio. In 2008, our founder Dick Bott was inducted into the National Religious Broadcasters Hall of Fame.The Bible provides answers to life's most important questions. Getting the Word of God into the People of God has been BRN's passion and vision since our founding.Highlights: Listen-Listen to Bott Radio Network's live Internet streamSchedule-Browse BRN's programming schedule for our national networkStations-Find station listings and frequencies for a BRN terrestrial station near you.Share-Send comments to BRN and interact with us on our Facebook and Twitter pages.BRN Jingles Soundboard-Our listeners love the BRN jingles, and many like to sing along! You'll have access to 22 BRN jingles so you can play them anytime you'd like.Ministry Links-These links make it easy for you to interact with and donate to your favorite BRN ministry partners.Today's Verse-A verse of the day, with comments on the day's verse, and a prayer that helps you bring the verse to life.For more information about Bott Radio Network visit: www.BottRadioNetwork.com

reviews.title: Great content, but has connection issues
reviews.comment: I love the content of this app.  Would rate 5 stars if it didn\'t have problems with network connection.   I have 4G and often have WiFi.  The error message says \"media applications won\'t work without a network connection\"  please fix.    Samsung  Galaxy S3
reviews.author: William Hamilton
